name: Bahiba Signature Offshore - Smoke T-Shirt
description:
Bahiba's Signature Offshore SMOKE T-Shirt, offers 100% extreme soft ring-spun cotton, with the signature Bahiba logo on front and back of the shirt.  

***This is a fitted shirt, so we HIGHLY recommend that you upsize your regular t-shirt size.  (example, if you wear a large, make sure you get an XL!).  Unless you like a tighter fitted look. The reason we chose this fitted T-Shirt was the sleeve cut and excellent quality.

You will want to wear this shirt all day, the feel is amazing wether you are just lounging around the beach all day, or pounding waves in your 32' foot center console, this shirt is epic!  Going along with tradition, this shirt has been dusted with pure white sand from the Bahamas, as if instilling the very essence of the Coastal Life.  Enjoy the life now.

Color: SMOKE
Made in Tropical Honduras
Hand Printed in the USA

name: Bahiba Coastal - Signature Decal Sticker
description: SLAP IT, on anything from a cooler, boat or vehicle.  Our signature sticker is UV and weather resistant.  Strong enough to be applied to the side of a boat.  Dimensions 2" by 3.5".
